00001 /*===========================================================================
00002 =                                                                           =
00003 =                          MtkSmoothData                                    =
00004 =                                                                           =
00005 =============================================================================
00006 
00007                          Jet Propulsion Laboratory
00008                                    MISR
00009                                MISR Toolkit
00010 
00011             Copyright 2008, California Institute of Technology.
00012                            ALL RIGHTS RESERVED.
00013                  U.S. Government Sponsorship acknowledged.
00014 
00015 ============================================================================*/
00016 
00017 #include "MisrRegression.h"
00018 #include "MisrUtil.h"
00019 #include <stdlib.h>
00020 #include <math.h>
00021 
00036 MTKt_status MtkSmoothData(
00037   const MTKt_DataBuffer *Data, 
00038   const MTKt_DataBuffer *Valid_mask, 
00039   int Width_line, 
00040   int Width_sample, 
00041   MTKt_DataBuffer *Data_smoothed 
00042 )
00043 {
00044   MTKt_status status_code;      /* Return status of this function */
00045   MTKt_status status;           /* Return status of called routines. */
00046   MTKt_DataBuffer data_smoothed_tmp = MTKT_DATABUFFER_INIT;
00047   int iline;
00048   int isample;
00049 
00050   /* -------------------------------------------------------------- */
00051   /* Argument check: Data == NULL                                   */
00052   /*                 Data->nline < 1                                */
00053   /*                 Data->nsample < 1                              */
00054   /*                 Data->datatype != MTKe_float                  */
00055   /* -------------------------------------------------------------- */
00056 
00057   if (Data == NULL) {
00058     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_NULLPTR);
00059   }
00060   if (Data->nline < 1) {
00061     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_OUTBOUNDS);
00062   }
00063   if (Data->nsample < 1) {
00064     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_OUTBOUNDS);
00065   }
00066   if (Data->datatype != MTKe_float) {
00067     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_OUTBOUNDS);
00068   }
00069 
00070   /* -------------------------------------------------------------- */
00071   /* Argument check: Valid_mask == NULL                             */
00072   /*                 Valid_mask->nline != Data->nline               */
00073   /*                 Valid_mask->nsample != Data->nsample           */
00074   /*                 Valid_mask->datatype != MTKe_uint8             */
00075   /* -------------------------------------------------------------- */
00076 
00077   if (Valid_mask == NULL) {
00078     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_NULLPTR);
00079   }
00080   if (Valid_mask->nline != Data->nline) {
00081     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_OUTBOUNDS);
00082   }
00083   if (Valid_mask->nsample != Data->nsample) {
00084     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_OUTBOUNDS);
00085   }
00086   if (Valid_mask->datatype != MTKe_uint8) {
00087     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_OUTBOUNDS);
00088   }
00089 
00090   /* -------------------------------------------------------------- */
00091   /* Argument check: Width_line < 1                                 */
00092   /*                 Width_line > Data->nline                       */
00093   /*                 Width_line is not odd                          */
00094   /* -------------------------------------------------------------- */
00095 
00096   if (Width_line < 1) {
00097     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_OUTBOUNDS);
00098   }
00099   if (Width_line > Data->nline) {
00100     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_OUTBOUNDS);
00101   }
00102   if ((Width_line & 1) == 0) {
00103     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_OUTBOUNDS);
00104   }
00105 
00106   /* -------------------------------------------------------------- */
00107   /* Argument check: Width_sample < 1                               */
00108   /*                 Width_sample > Data->nsample                   */
00109   /*                 Width_sample is not odd                        */
00110   /* -------------------------------------------------------------- */
00111 
00112   if (Width_sample < 1) {
00113     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_OUTBOUNDS);
00114   }
00115   if (Width_sample > Data->nsample) {
00116     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_OUTBOUNDS);
00117   }
00118   if ((Width_sample & 1) == 0) {
00119     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_OUTBOUNDS);
00120   }
00121 
00122   /* -------------------------------------------------------------- */
00123   /* Argument check: Data_smoothed = NULL                           */
00124   /* -------------------------------------------------------------- */
00125 
00126   if (Data_smoothed == NULL) {
00127     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_NULLPTR);
00128   }
00129 
00130   /* -------------------------------------------------------------- */
00131   /* Allocate memory for smoothed data                              */
00132   /* -------------------------------------------------------------- */
00133 
00134   status = MtkDataBufferAllocate(Data->nline,
00135                  Data->nsample,
00136                  MTKe_float,
00137                  &data_smoothed_tmp);
00138   MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status);
00139 
00140   /* -------------------------------------------------------------- */
00141   /* For each location in smoothed data....(begin loop)             */
00142   /* -------------------------------------------------------------- */
00143 
00144   for (iline = 0 ; iline < Data->nline ; iline++) {
00145     for (isample = 0 ; isample < Data->nsample ; isample++) {
00146       double window_sum = 0.0;  /* Sum of valid elements in the window */
00147       int count = 0;        /* Count of valid elements in the window */
00148       int wline;
00149       int wsample;
00150 
00151   /* -------------------------------------------------------------- */
00152   /* If this location is not valid in the input data, then skip to  */
00153   /* the next location.   Don't attempt to fill in gaps.            */
00154   /* -------------------------------------------------------------- */
00155 
00156       if (!Valid_mask->data.u8[iline][isample]) {
00157     continue;
00158       }
00159 
00160   /* -------------------------------------------------------------- */
00161   /* Sum all valid data points in the smoothing window centered at  */
00162   /* this location.  Where data is not available, duplicate the     */
00163   /* data value at the center of the window.  This has the effect   */
00164   /* of giving higher weight to the center of the window where      */
00165   /* information is not available across the entire window.         */
00166   /* -------------------------------------------------------------- */
00167 
00168       for (wline = iline - ((Width_line - 1) / 2) ; 
00169        wline <= iline + ((Width_line - 1) / 2) ; wline++) {
00170     for (wsample = isample - ((Width_sample - 1) / 2) ; 
00171          wsample <= isample + ((Width_sample - 1) / 2) ; wsample++) {
00172       
00173       if ((wline >= 0 && wline < Data->nline) &&
00174           (wsample >= 0 && wsample < Data->nsample) &&
00175           Valid_mask->data.u8[wline][wsample]) {
00176         window_sum += Data->data.f[wline][wsample];
00177       } else {
00178         window_sum += Data->data.f[iline][isample];
00179       }
00180       count++;
00181     }
00182       }
00183       
00184   /* -------------------------------------------------------------- */
00185   /* Set smoothed value at this location.                           */
00186   /* -------------------------------------------------------------- */
00187 
00188       data_smoothed_tmp.data.f[iline][isample] = 
00189     window_sum / (double)count;
00190 
00191   /* -------------------------------------------------------------- */
00192   /* End loop for each location in smoothed data.                   */
00193   /* -------------------------------------------------------------- */
00194 
00195     }
00196   }
00197 
00198   *Data_smoothed = data_smoothed_tmp;
00199   return MTK_SUCCESS;
00200 
00201 ERROR_HANDLE:
00202   MtkDataBufferFree(&data_smoothed_tmp);
00203   return status_code;
00204 }
